column1: Smoque BBQ////I'm in BBQ Heaven again
column2: I had the sliced brisket sandwich
column3: and it just melted in my mouth
column4: there are not enough food adjectives to explain this taste and feeling! I now have a new comfort food HQ
column5: and its practically walking distance from one of my clients. I can't wait to bring out of town friends to eat here
column6: even if it means waiting in line for 45+ minutes
